name: Drain Defense 0.53
description:
New in 0.56:

  1. Implementation of a better water shader
  2. UI Messenger

New in 0.55:

  • New shader effects on spigots, floating debris, and drains.
  • Spigots can push debris under the water.

New in 0.53:

  • DO NOT LET MUCK OVERRUN THE FACILITY.

Early functional prototype of a fluid based tower defense game. Avoid letting the vulgar objects down the drain! You have 30 lives, your only objective is to "stabilize" the map, in other words get to the point where you can't lose!

Land! You'll need some if you want to build towers on water.  This game is open to collaboration! Please see https://godotforums.org/d/33142-drain-defense-playable-and-open-to-collaboration.
